snippet: Thirteen months after former President Ronald Reagan's Rancho del Cielo went on the market, there appears to be a serious buyer: taxpayers.    Under a deal in the works, Congress would appropriate $5 million, which the Interior Department would gi...
lead_paragraph: Thirteen months after former President Ronald Reagan's Rancho del Cielo went on the market, there appears to be a serious buyer: taxpayers. Under a deal in the works, Congress would appropriate $5 million, which the Interior Department would give to California to buy the ranch as a state park, Gov. Pete Wilson's spokesman, Sean Walsh, said today.
abstract: California, with help from Federal Government, may turn former Pres Ronald Reagan's Rancho del Cielo ranch in Santa Barbara into park (S)

headline.main: National News Briefs; California Might Turn Reagan Ranch Into Park
